main event: The report documents multiple photographs of the installation and operation of the 'Hell Roarer,' an aircraft equipped with a magnesium burner.
interesting points: The aircraft's magnesium burner is said to emit bright light or flames when in action., The report includes descriptions of four different photographs related to the aircraft and its operations., One photo captures an explosion or fire with smoke and a structure in the background., Another photo highlights the aircraft with people standing near it at night under beams of light., The name 'Hell Roarer' suggests a focus on the intensity and capabilities of the aircraft.
sighted object: an aircraft (RB-26) with a magnesium burner
